text: We nearby having Birthday glamping & BBQ instead of sailing, very windy all days is a nice place & good experience we enjoy so much.

The National Sailing Centre is located at the south- eastern tip of Singapore along the East Coast Park. It occupies 2.4 hectares of land.
SingaporeSailing is the national governing body overseeing all sailing activities in Singapore, bringing the joy of sailing to all Singaporeans, for both young and elderly.

i have learnt from there a lot and i hen went back there for VIA in return when they thought us sailing and now i will go back to volunteer when they have a race like regatta race. i would spent my whole day there until 6pm or when is the last day, iâ€™ll be staying they much later to help out in the prize giving and have dinner there.
Great location to see planes flying in overhead. You can hear wake vortex of the bigger plane models after a few seconds of it passing! #planeviewing

Had a terrible experience sailing here nothing productive is ever done and the club looks abandoned. Only widely used because it makes itself the grounds for national training if not its quite literally the worse club in Singapore. Non of the staff do anything and when u ask them for help they claim they will do it but they just go and forget about it. Utterly useless
